meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in proteins.
meanings.sent1: Histidins are important building blocks for our body's proteins.
meanings.sent2: The histidins in this food help in muscle repair.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled histidins all over the lab, creating a protein mess!
meanings.sent4: Her love for histidins was like the strong bonds they form in proteins.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, histidins look like tiny puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The recipe calls for two teaspoons of histidins.
meanings.sent2: Histidins are commonly used in scientific experiments.
meanings.sent3: The histidins on the shelf seem to be having a party, each one dancing around.
meanings.sent4: In the bowl, the histidins resembled a group of friends huddled together.
meanings.sent5: The bag contained a mix of histidins, each with its own role in the dish.
